reason: nestedClass is null, so accessing its method printName() causes a NullPointerException.
Accessing list[10] attempts to write beyond the bounds of the array (0-9).
Incrementing Integer.MAX_VALUE causes an integer overflow, resulting in unexpected behavior.
The loop condition 'i < 5' is never met because 'i' is always incremented within the loop body. This creates an infinite loop.
A RuntimeException is thrown but not caught or handled, leading to program termination.
